lead_paragraph: California rallied in the final 500 meters yesterday to defeat Princeton and capture the Intercollegiate Rowing Association Championship on the Cooper River in Camden, N.J. California Coach Steve Gladstone won his 11th I.R.A. championship over all and his sixth with the Golden Bears.
